section.title: Variables, Options, and Parameters
section.para: How often have you been confused about whether to tag something as a variable, as an option, as optional, or even as a literal? Happens to me all the time. Hopefully this will help. I need help too; I admit it. Feel free to volunteer thoughts. Again I reiterate that the first port of call for tag usage guide lines should be DocBook: The Definitive Guide
